column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=David Shankbone :
#Text=What is your relationship to Theistic Satanists ?
#Text=Peter H. Gilmore :
#Text=We do n't think they are Satanists .
#Text=They are devil worshipers , as far as I ’m concerned .
#Text=DS :
#Text=There is one in New York who does a lot of websites .
#Text=PG :
#Text=Diane Vera ?
#Text=She 's a kook .
#Text=DS : She 's also an editor on Wikipedia .
#Text=I contacted her , but I never received a response .
#Text=PG :
#Text=My real feeling is that anybody who believes in supernatural entities on some level is insane .
#Text=Whether they believe in The Devil or God , they are abdicating reason .

#Text=If they really believe they are in communication with some sort of interventionist deity…you know , somebody can be a deist and think that maybe there was some sort of force that launched everything and now has nothing to do with it .
#Text=That 's not anything you can prove .
#Text=It 's also not a matter of faith .
#Text=It 's a matter of making a choice between whether there was something or there was n't .
#Text=I think maybe that is the most rational decision .
#Text=I think science makes it look otherwise , but I do n't think somebody like that is mad .
#Text=But anybody who believes in some kind of existence in deity or spirits or anything that intervenes in their life is not somebody I hold in any kind of esteem .
#Text=DS : Have you had much interaction with the theistic Satanists ?
#Text=PG :
#Text=No , I just have complete contempt for them and have no contact with them at all .
#Text=If anybody does contact me and say they are a theistic Satanist we tell them to take a hike . [ Laughs ] .
#Text=DS : Do you know what they think of you ?
#Text=PG :
#Text=I have no idea and I could not care .
#Text=I consider it lunatic and it 's Christian .
#Text=If you want to believe in an existing devil then you probably believe in an existing God and you ’re really just a Christian heretic , you ’re not a Satanist .
#Text=DS : What do you think is their motivation to worship a Christian Satan ?
#Text=PG :
#Text=I really would n't know , I ’d have to talk to them , but my supposition would be that they want to feel they are naughty on some level .
#Text=If they really believe in these existing deities , then they have to decide what the values of them are .

#Text=The Gnostics used to think that Jehovah was bad ; the demiurge , and that the real God was something more in touch with what they thought humanity should be like . So , maybe these people think that Jehovah is evil and Satan is good .
#Text=I just think it 's equally silly whether you believe in an Easter Bunny or Zeus ... it 's just ... irrational .
